name: Cacturne ex
author: Hikaru Koike

poke_body.name: Cursed Glare
poke_body.effect: As long as Cacturne ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can’t attach any Special Energy cards (except for {D} and {M} Energy cards) from his or her hand to his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Spike Rend
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
